pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilities for Interacting with the 'CCTE' APIs // Access chemical, hazard, and bioactivity data from the Center for Computational Toxicology and Exposure ('CCTE') APIs https://api-ccte.epa.gov/docs/. 'ccdR' was developed to streamline the process of accessing the information available through the 'CCTE' APIs without requiring prior knowledge of how to use APIs. All data is also available on the CompTox Chemical Dashboard ('CCD') https://comptox.epa.gov/dashboard/.
